item.title: About
item.description:
Me

For the time being I'll just copy my Mastodon intro:

striving for the ultimate minimalist, productive, stable setup - like a piece of paper and a pencil, just digitalâ€¦

GNU/Linux, BSD, Solaris, emacs, light themes, traveling, reading, podcasts, cooking, learning languages, tinkering with old-tech, calisthenics, decluttering/minimalism and occasionally writing
